subject: feat: complete Dashboard V2 with detail pane and trend visualizations
body:
- Add slide-out detail pane (desktop) / bottom sheet (mobile) for drill-down
- Add click interactions for cards, charts, and bars to show filtered commits
- Add Urgency Trend line chart showing average by month
- Add Impact Over Time stacked bar chart
- Add Urgency by Contributor and Impact by Contributor breakdowns
- Wire up dark mode support for all new charts
- Update documentation with completion status
title: complete Dashboard V2 with detail pane and trend visualizations
